options.label: build
options.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

options.label: chore
options.description: Updating grunt tasks etc; no production code change

options.label: ci
options.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

options.label: docs
options.description: Documentation only changes

options.label: feat
options.description: A new feature

options.label: fix
options.description: A bug fix

options.label: perf
options.description: A code change that improves performance

options.label: refactor
options.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

options.label: style
options.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

options.label: test
options.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

commit-message-editor.tokens.label: Scope
commit-message-editor.tokens.name: scope
commit-message-editor.tokens.description: A scope may be provided to a commit's type, to provide additional contextual information and is contained within parenthesis, e.g., "feat(parser): add ability to parse arrays".

options.description: No specific file or directory

options.label: .github
options.description: GitHub workflow related files and configurations

options.label: .gitignore
options.description: GitHub configurations for ignoring files

options.label: .vscode
options.description: Configurations for VSCode - Particularly commits

options.label: package.json
options.description: Semantic Release and Note configuration for entire project

options.label: pyproject.toml
options.description: Python project configuration file

options.label: readme.md
options.description: Readme file

options.label: .tours
options.description: Tour files

options.label: .vscode
options.description: Visual Studio Code related files and configurations

options.description: Site Title React Package for CDH LAVA Python

options.description: Documentation
